alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Jefferson (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 1:40AM CST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Jefferson, northwestern Hamilton and central Franklin Counties through 230 AM CST... At 139 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over West City, or near Benton, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Benton and Rend Lake Area around 145 AM CST. Other locations in the path of this storm include Mcleansboro. This includes Interstate 57 in Illinois between Mile Markers 63 and 78. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
